derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete French umbelle or Latin umbella 'sunshade', diminutive of umbra (see umbra)

means.word_mean: 1. flat-topped or rounded inflorescence characteristic of the family Umbelliferae in which the individual flower stalks arise from about the same point; youngest flowers are at the center
